ACTIVITY METRIC
FN-IN 000.A Number of policies in force, by segment: (1) property and casualty, (2) life, (3) assumed reinsurance.
As of December 31, 2021, AMERISAFE had more than 8,000 voluntary business policyholders with an 
average annual workers’ compensation policy written premium of $31,000. The ten largest voluntary business 
policyholders accounted for 1.9% of in-force premiums.
Workers’ compensation insurance is not property insurance. Our insurance provides for wage replacement and 
medical care benefits to the employees of our policyholders. As a monoline insurer, workers’ compensation is 
our only line of business. We do not write life insurance or reinsurance.
